A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I personally enjoyed this movie. Was it what I was expecting.. No. but this doesn't make it bad movie. I enjoyed its twists and turns.. a few scenes felt slightly out of place. But overall I'm happy and will be seeing it a few more with popcorn in hand. I think its time that the star wars universe evolves a little.. I am excited to see what the future of star wars holds.
